meanings.definition: A drink made from fermented honey and water.
meanings.sent1: At the festival, they served hydromel in wooden cups.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy sipping hydromel on warm summer evenings.
meanings.sent3: The bees threw a party and drank all the hydromel!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as hydromel flowing from a fountain.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of hydromel filled the room, inviting everyone to taste.

meanings.definition: A sweet alcoholic beverage made from honey and water.
meanings.sent1: The tavern offered a variety of hydromel flavors.
meanings.sent2: During the celebration, guests toasted with hydromel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elves replaced the water with hydromel in the fountain.
meanings.sent4: His words were as smooth as hydromel, calming the tense atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The golden color of hydromel shimmered under the candlelight.
